com.guoxiaoixng.gxadapter.sticky

类 GridStickyLayoutManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guoxiaoixng.gxadapter.sticky.SectionLayoutManager
      • com.guoxiaoixng.gxadapter.sticky.GridStickyLayoutManager

  • public class GridStickyLayoutManager
extends SectionLayoutManager
    Lays out views in a grid. The number of columns can be set directly, or a minimum size can be requested. If you request a 100dip minimum column size and there is 330dip available, the layout with calculate there to be 3 columns each 130dip across.

    • 方法详细资料

      • computeHeaderOffset

        public int computeHeaderOffset(int firstVisiblePosition,
                               SectionData sd,
                               LayoutState state)
        从类复制的说明: SectionLayoutManager
        Compute the offset for side aligned headers. If the height of the non-visible area of the section is taller than the header, then the header should be offscreen, in that case return any +ve number.
        指定者:
        computeHeaderOffset 在类中 SectionLayoutManager
        参数:
        firstVisiblePosition - Position of first visible item in section.
        sd - Section data.
        state - Layout state.
        返回:
        -ve number giving the distance the header should be offset before the anchor view. A +ve number indicates the header is offscreen.

      • fillToEnd

        public int fillToEnd(int leadingEdge,
                     int markerLine,
                     int anchorPosition,
                     SectionData sd,
                     LayoutState state)
        从类复制的说明: SectionLayoutManager
        Fill section content towards the end.
        指定者:
        fillToEnd 在类中 SectionLayoutManager
        参数:
        leadingEdge - Line to fill up to. Content will not be wholly beyond this line.
        markerLine - Start of the section content area.
        anchorPosition - Adapter position for the first content item in the section.
        sd - Section data.
        state - Layout state.
        返回:
        Line to which content has been filled.

      • fillToStart

        public int fillToStart(int leadingEdge,
                       int markerLine,
                       int anchorPosition,
                       SectionData sd,
                       LayoutState state)

      • finishFillToEnd

        public int finishFillToEnd(int leadingEdge,
                           android.view.View anchor,
                           SectionData sd,
                           LayoutState state)
        从类复制的说明: SectionLayoutManager
        Finish filling an already partially filled section.
        指定者:
        finishFillToEnd 在类中 SectionLayoutManager
        参数:
        leadingEdge - Line to fill up to. Content will not be wholly beyond this line.
        anchor - Last attached content item in this section.
        sd - Section data.
        state - Layout state.
        返回:
        Line to which content has been filled.

      • getLowestEdge

        public int getLowestEdge(int sectionFirstPosition,
                         int lastIndex,
                         int defaultEdge)
        从类复制的说明: SectionLayoutManager
        Find the lowest displayed edge of the section. If there is no member found then return the default edge instead.
        覆盖:
        getLowestEdge 在类中 SectionLayoutManager
        参数:
        sectionFirstPosition - Section id, position of first item in the section.
        lastIndex - Index to start looking from. Usually the index of the last attached view in this section.
        defaultEdge - Default value.
        返回:
        Lowest (attached) edge of the section.

      • init

        public GridStickyLayoutManager init(SectionData sd)
        覆盖:
        init 在类中 SectionLayoutManager

      • fillRow

        public int fillRow(int markerLine,
                   int anchorPosition,
                   StickyLayoutManager.Direction direction,
                   boolean measureRowItems,
                   SectionData sd,
                   LayoutState state)
        Fill a row.
        参数:
        markerLine - Line indicating the top edge of the row.
        anchorPosition - Position of the first view in the row.
        direction - Direction of edge to fill towards.
        measureRowItems - Measure the row items.
        sd - Section data.
        state - Layout state.
        返回:
        The height of the new row.
